data.title: 586 Name the Movie Trivia Quizzes
data.text:
FREE! Click here to Join FunTrivia. Thousands of games, quizzes, and lots more!

Name the Movie Trivia

Name the Movie Trivia Quizzes

Home

»

Quizzes

»

Movie Trivia

»

Movie Mixture

Can you guess what the title of the movie is if only given a few clues?

586 quizzes and 8,204 trivia questions.

1.

Guess the Movies

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

A variety of movies to guess. Some famous, some more obscure. A little background knowledge is needed for a couple. Pick the title of the movie based on the description and picture clue.

Easier, 10 Qns, Upstart3, Oct 21 22

Easier

Upstart3

Oct 21 22

6025 plays

2.

Name the Movie in Three Clues

Match Quiz

10 Qns

The left side will have three clues to lead you to a movie on the right side. Match the clues with the movie it goes with. The clues will be explained in the interesting info. It may contain spoilers.

Easier, 10 Qns, Ilona_Ritter, Apr 03 23

Easier

Ilona_Ritter

Apr 03 23

1743 plays

3.

Three Actors, One Film

Match Quiz

10 Qns

With the names of three actors can you successfully match them to the film in which they all appeared?

Very Easy, 10 Qns, rossian, Oct 12 22

Very Easy

rossian

Oct 12 22

1720 plays

4.

What Movie Was I In?

Match Quiz

10 Qns

Both male and female characters need help finding the movies they were in. Choose the movie that goes with the male or female character.

Easier, 10 Qns, pennie1478, Apr 27 23

Easier

pennie1478

Apr 27 23

705 plays

5.

Take the first letters from questions 1 to 11 to come up with the movie title. Good luck, I doubt you'll need it.

Easier, 15 Qns, linkan, Nov 14 23

Easier

linkan

Nov 14 23

19907 plays

6.

Hollywood's Top 10 Favourite Movies

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

If there is one thing people love as much as going to the movies, it's making lists of great movies. From the image clues, work out the ten best in a countdown of "Hollywood's 100 Favorite Films" as chosen by "Hollywood Reporter" in 2014.

Easier, 10 Qns, darksplash, Jul 03 22

Easier

darksplash

Jul 03 22

1667 plays

7.

What Am I Watching?

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

Hopefully the photos will be helpful in determining which movie I am watching. Some may be a wee bit cryptic, though...

Average, 10 Qns, ozzz2002, Nov 18 13

Average

ozzz2002

3142 plays

8.

Can You Picture the Picture?

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

This is a quiz for people who enjoy movies. Will a photograph help you determine which picture is being described? Give it a try.

Average, 10 Qns, CmdrK, Dec 04 14

Average

CmdrK

3232 plays

9.

There Might Be Cats

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

Then again, the cats might be hard to find (though they're there). Use the photo clues to help answer the questions and name the movies and it might all become clear. Even if it doesn't, just have fun, eh?

Easier, 10 Qns, spanishliz, Mar 10 20

Easier

spanishliz

Mar 10 20

941 plays

10.

Name the 20th Century Movie

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

See if you can name these popular movies of the 20th Century. We'll walk through in chronological order. Check the pictures for extra clues!

Easier, 10 Qns, timence, Apr 26 15

Easier

timence

2053 plays

Quick Question

Dead or alive, you tell me the film: Detroit, Cop, OCP, Verhoeven.

From Quiz "4 Words - 1 Movie"

Lethal Weapon

Police Academy

Robocop

Detroit

11.

On Location

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

Let's go on a sight-seeing tour of movie locations - tell me which movie was filmed on these beautiful sites!

Average, 10 Qns, merylfederman, Mar 30 14

Average

merylfederman

1916 plays

12.

Picture These Movie Titles

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

Welcome to the next stage of my Adventures in Authoring quest. This time it is a photo quiz about movie titles using photgraphs. I hope you enjoy playing it. Note: Contains film plots.

Average, 10 Qns, mcsurfie, Aug 11 23

Average

mcsurfie

Aug 11 23

2922 plays

13.

Name the 20th Century Movie: Part 3

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

Here it is: the critics said it shouldn't be done but the studio had to go for one more. Remember to check the images for extra clues!

Easier, 10 Qns, timence, Jun 03 15

Easier

timence

1152 plays

14.

Celluloid City

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

With the help of the photo's can you identify these movies, each with a city in the title?

Easier, 10 Qns, 480154st, Mar 21 19

Easier

480154st

Mar 21 19

690 plays

15.

Help? Anybody?

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

All of these people were in peril, but all of them, by and large, were alone. See if you can identify the films in which these ten protagonists had to overcome the odds solo. Good luck!

Easier, 10 Qns, kyleisalive, Apr 23 17

Easier

kyleisalive

1841 plays

16.

One-Word Movie Titles [2]

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

No major gimmicks to this one; you guess the title of the film, and it only has one word. Good luck!

Easier, 10 Qns, kyleisalive, Dec 04 14

Easier

kyleisalive

2578 plays

17.

Needs...More...Oxygen...

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

And now for ten films I find excruciatingly claustrophobic. Get yourself out of a tight situation (or a helpless one) and guess the movies correctly. Good luck!

Average, 10 Qns, kyleisalive, May 29 14

Average

kyleisalive

4224 plays

18.

Cinematic Limerick Mix

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Limericks about some popular movies - a mixture of old and new.

Easier, 10 Qns, Upstart3, Jun 14 20

Easier

Upstart3

Jun 14 20

1136 plays

19.

Name the 20th Century Movie: Part 2

Photo Quiz

10 Qns

The first part was so popular, a sequel became inevitable. No doubt it will be deemed of much lower quality by the critics, and certainly the actors will ask for much more money! Enjoy and don't forget to check pictures for extra clues.

Easier, 10 Qns, timence, May 04 15

Easier

timence

1192 plays

20.

What Movie Was That Character From Again? #1

Match Quiz

15 Qns

Sometimes we can remember characters, but not the movie they come from, and vice versa. How well do you remember these characters? I'll give you at least 3 characters, you match up the title with the characters.

Easier, 15 Qns, BigVBDude, Jan 18 21

Easier

BigVBDude

Jan 18 21

746 plays

21.

Name That Movie: Downward Spiral With A Twist

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

In this quiz you will be given clues to enable you to name the movie. The only trouble is as question number increases the number of clues decrease. Good luck!

Average, 10 Qns, 1nn1, Dec 06 14

Average

1nn1

2707 plays

22.

Now Cut That Out!

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Some plot points and ideas don't make it out of the script while some get filmed and don't make it to the final cut. Test your knowledge of movies by recognizing these actual deleted scenes and plot devices left on the cutting room floor. Good luck!

Easier, 10 Qns, kyleisalive, Nov 14 12

Easier

kyleisalive

1689 plays

23.

Shirley Temple was the most prominent child actress in the 1930s. Here is a list of movies featuring other child or teen actresses. Some of them were their debut movies.

Average, 10 Qns, sw11, Apr 19 23

Average

sw11

Apr 19 23

763 plays

24.

Movies I Hate That Everyone Else Loves

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Like the title suggests, these are movies that are very popular but I either have no desire to see them or saw them and didn't enjoy them. I'll give you some facts about the movie and you need to name it.

Easier, 10 Qns, ramonesrule, Aug 15 20

Easier

ramonesrule

Aug 15 20

1442 plays

25.

Go Ahead, Make My Day

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Perhaps, decades ago, someone posed this question to the film directors of the world. Here are ten different films that MUST have been created as a response to this adamant urging. Good luck!

Average, 10 Qns, kyleisalive, Jun 08 10

Average

kyleisalive

2832 plays

26.

Anaconda Movies

Multiple Choice

15 Qns

What is an 'Anaconda Movie' you say. Well one that has a title that begins and ends with the same letter of course. Best of luck on the quiz!

Easier, 15 Qns, Triviaballer, May 26 17

Easier

Triviaballer

1508 plays

27.

Match the Movie to the Spoiler

Match Quiz

10 Qns

Some of the biggest spoilers in cinema history lie ahead. If you don't mind such spoilers, see if you can match the brief description of a movie's twist ending with its title. There's only one way these all match correctly. Good luck!

Average, 10 Qns, PootyPootwell, Oct 25 17

Average

PootyPootwell

Oct 25 17

911 plays

28.

Movies with Misleading Titles 3

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

This topic has proven popular, so here goes with another selection of movies with misleading titles.

Easier, 10 Qns, kingscourt, Nov 22 15

Easier

kingscourt

2675 plays

29.

Action! ABCs (The Best Movies Alphabetically)

Multiple Choice

25 Qns

Three roles in the film are given. Pick the greatest movie for each letter of the alphabet that brought those characters to life. The letter X has been omitted.

Average, 25 Qns, mj20, Jul 01 22

Average

mj20

Jul 01 22

615 plays

30.

The Favorite Movies of the Midwest USA Players

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Midwest USA Players has a number of members, and everyone has a favorite movie. Let's ask some of our members what their favorite movie is, and we'll see if we can guess what it is.

Easier, 10 Qns, Spaudrey, Aug 02 13

Easier

Spaudrey
